title: Anatomy and Physiology
description: Comprehensive textbook covering human anatomy and physiology.

title: Internal Medicine
description: Covers topics like infectious diseases, respiratory and cardiovascular conditions.

description: Provides standardized treatment protocols and essential medicines.

title: Diagnosis and Treatment Manual
description: Guidelines for diagnosing and treating various medical conditions.

title: The WHO Manual of Diagnostic Imaging
description: Radiographic anatomy and interpretation of the musculoskeletal system.

title: Clinical Pharmacology in Health Care, Teaching and Research
description: Explores the role of clinical pharmacology in various settings.

title: Immunology
description: Introduction to the immune system and its functions.

title: Ultrasound Physics and Its Application in Medicine
description: Basics of ultrasound physics and medical applications.

title: Good Clinical Diagnostic Practice
description: Guidance on accurate clinical diagnosis and use of diagnostic services.

title: Social Medicine
description: Examines social determinants of health and their impact.

title: A Clinical Text-Book of Medical Diagnosis
description: Historical perspective on medical diagnosis practices.

title: A Text-Book of Medical Diagnosis
description: Comprehensive guide on medical diagnostic methods.

title: Fundamentals of Human Anatomy Laboratory Manual
description: Laboratory manual for introductory human anatomy courses.

title: Radiobiology Textbook
description: Covers radiation biology and its medical applications.

title: Textbook of Patient Safety and Clinical Risk Management
description: Focuses on patient safety and managing clinical risks.

title: Clinical Procedures for Safer Patient Care
description: Guidelines for safe clinical procedures.

title: Mind the Gap: A Handbook of Clinical Signs in Black and Brown Skin
description: Addresses clinical signs in diverse skin tones.

title: Medical Imaging Systems: An Introductory Guide
description: Introduction to various medical imaging systems.

title: Safe Use of Ultrasound in Medical Diagnosis
description: Guidelines for the safe application of ultrasound in medicine.

title: Clinical Semiology
description: Detailed information on physical examinations and syndromes.
